posts.post_title: Nick Maddox on Sale PSA 4 $50.00 - Other Items On Sale for Net54 Members
posts.post_content:
This Maddox T206 is on sale for $50.00, +$2.50 shipping.

I'll be having a 4th of July sale on my BIN items listed on Ebay beginning July 1st.  All items will be discounted by 15%.  I'm offering Net54 member a discount early, starting immediately any BIN listing is 20% off to Net54 members.  Payment by check, MO or Paypal (gift preferred).  Please contact me via PM or email as the sale will be made "off ebay".

Happy Fourth of July!!

Jim
